entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
